New Records: Jack Leiter recorded a career-high six strikeouts and had a fastball speed of 98.5 mph, the highest recorded in his career
Key Match Events: Texas Rangers defeated Los Angeles Angels 6-4, with Jack Leiter's strong performance turning the game around after a rough start
Post-Match Reflections: Bruce Bochy praised Jack Leiter's resilience and performance, while Josh Smith commended his role in the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jack Leiter's consecutive strong starts in the rotation were noted, showing progress since the first half of the season
